title: Car.Mechanic.Simulator.2015.Gold.Edition-P2P
description:
Release Date: 09/2015 Protection: Steam+Custom
Discs: 1 Genre: Racing

New cars, new tools, new options, more parts and much more fun in
the next version of Car Mechanic Simulator! Take your wrench!
Create and expand your auto repairs service empire. Car Mechanic
Simulator 2015 will take you behind the scenes of daily routine in
car workshop. Take on the role of the car mechanic and repair cars
for your clients. Spend the earned money on expanding your workshop
and improving your skills

For more info go to: http://store.steampowered.com/app/320300/

1. Extract release
2. Mount ISO
3. Install the game
4. Copy crack from the PLAZA folder
5. Play!

Notes: the official Gold Edition includes the original game updated to
the latest version and listed downloadable content:

> Car Mechanic Simulator 2015 - Youngtimer
> Car Mechanic Simulator 2015 - Visual Tuning
> Car Mechanic Simulator 2015 - Trader Pack
> Car Mechanic Simulator 2015 - PickUp & SUV

General Notes:

Block the game's exe in your firewall to prevent the game from
trying to go online
If you install games to your systemdrive, it may be necessary
to run this game with admin privileges instead

CODEX - ENiGMA - ADDONiA

Coming soon
